title: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added but the dataset is not set, the group dialog should still be available for defining a group. Currently, the group dialog is not shown when the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and we try to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and we try to create a new table group, the group dialog should be shown.
SR: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try to create a new table group. 3. Observe that the group dialog is not shown.
